Order create default:
Customer default keys are:
'tax_class_id','group_id','email','prefix','firstname','middlename','lastname','suffix','dob','gender'

Customer address default keys are:
'customer_id', 'save_in_address_book', 'customer_address_id', 'email', 'prefix', 'firstname', 'middlename', 'lastname', 'suffix', 'company', 'street', 'city', 'region', 'postcode', 'country_id', 'telephone', 'fax', 'dhlaccount'

{{quote_id}} can be used as placeholder.
Bestellung anlegen - Standardwerte:
Die Kunden Standard-Element-IDs lauten:
'tax_class_id','group_id','email','prefix','firstname','middlename','lastname','suffix','dob','gender'

Die Standard-Address-Ids lauten:
'customer_id', 'save_in_address_book', 'customer_address_id', 'email', 'prefix', 'firstname', 'middlename', 'lastname', 'suffix', 'company', 'street', 'city', 'region', 'postcode', 'country_id', 'telephone', 'fax', 'dhlaccount'

{{quote_id}} kann als dynamischer Platzhalter verwendet werden.
